definition: to look forward and back/to consider prudently/overcautious
to gaze/to view
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
surname Gu
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
empress/queen/(archaic) monarch/ruler
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
surname Hou

sentences.english: He often looks before and after when he deals with problems.
sentences.chinese: 他处理问题时常常瞻前顾后。

sentences.english: You have to cultivate the habit of doing before knowing.
sentences.chinese: 你需要培养在瞻前顾后之前开始行动的习惯？

sentences.english: Cultivate the habit of surveying and testing a prospective action before undertaking it.
sentences.chinese: 在实际行动之前要养成瞻前顾后的习惯。

sentences.english: He said he's leaning toward retirement but goes back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 他说，他倾向于退休，但瞻前顾后的。

definition: afraid of the head, terrified of the tail (idiom); ever fearful and nervous/afraid of the slightest thing
lit. to fear the wolf in front and the tiger behind (idiom)/fig. to be full of needless fears/reds under the beds
pinyin: qian2 pa4 lang2 hou4 pa4 hu3

definition: indecisive/irresolute
to worry about personal gains and losses
to hesitate over what move to make (idiom); to waver/to shilly-shally
hesitancy/indecision/to waver
to shrink back in fear (idiom); too cowardly to advance
(idiom) to hesitate/to remain undecided
when things come to a head (idiom)
cavalier/offhand/reckless
to act impetuously (idiom); on an impulse
timid/gutless/weakling
to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance
bound hand and foot (idiom); constrained
to hesitate to move forward/to hesitate/to hold back
to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
